resources.string: When your phone is lost or stolen you will be able to use someone else's phone to retrieve the GPS coordinates at your phone's location to help you find it via a SMS include Verify Code set by yourself.
I've entered "Heydude" as default for the verify code. Now you can send a text message with "Heydude" as the body of the text as shown below:
It can be changed it to anything by clicking button "Change Verify Code".
A Useful Android App - Phone Finder
